'''v0.10.4 alpha''' is a minor update to ''[[Pocket Edition|Minecraft: Pocket Edition]]'' released to fix some bugs and crashes in [[Pocket Edition v0.10.3 alpha|v0.10.3]]. For iOS, this version includes changes from [[Pocket Edition v0.10.1 alpha|v0.10.1]], [[Pocket Edition v0.10.2 alpha|v0.10.2]] and v0.10.3, along with support for the iPhone 6 Plus' screen resolution. This is also the first version released for the Windows Phone 8.1. This is the final version released in 2014.

== Changes ==

* The iOS gloss effect is re-added for iOS 5 and iOS 6 devices.
* Native support for iPhone 6 Plus
